metadata.title: Dogplay Agent - High Revenue Affiliate Program in India
metadata.description: Join the Dogplay Agent program and earn up to 45% RevShare with CPA options. Trusted by top Indian affiliates with crypto payments and 24/7 support.
metadata.keywords: Dogplay agent, betting affiliate India, cricket betting affiliate, iGaming partner program

hero.title: Earn Up to 45% Revenue Share with Dogplay Agent
hero.subtitle: Join thousands of successful affiliates promoting India's most trusted betting platform. Competitive CPA, lifetime RevShare, and instant crypto payouts.

commission.title: Competitive Commission
commission.description: Earn up to 45% RevShare or choose CPA up to $200 per active player. Flexible plans for your traffic.

payment.title: Fast Crypto Payouts
payment.description: Receive payments instantly in USDT, BTC, or other cryptocurrencies. No delays, no hassles.

tracking.title: Real-time Tracking
tracking.description: Monitor your players, commissions, and performance with our advanced dashboard and analytics.

support.title: Dedicated Support
support.description: 24/7 personal affiliate manager ready to help you maximize your earnings.

calculator.title: Estimate Your Monthly Earnings
calculator.subtitle: See how much you can earn as a Dogplay affiliate

1.title: Create Your Account
1.description: Sign up for free in just 2 minutes. No verification required to start.

2.title: Get Your Referral Link
2.description: Access marketing materials and tracking links from your dashboard.

3.title: Earn & Withdraw
3.description: Promote to your audience and watch your commissions grow. Withdraw anytime.

payment.question: How do I receive my payments?
payment.answer: We offer instant cryptocurrency payments (USDT, BTC, ETH) and bank transfers for Indian affiliates. Minimum withdrawal is ₹5,000 for crypto and ₹10,000 for bank transfer.

commission.question: What commission plans are available?
commission.answer: We offer both RevShare (up to 45% lifetime) and CPA (up to $200 per player) plans. You can also choose a hybrid plan combining both. Contact your affiliate manager to customize your plan.

cricket.question: Do you support cricket betting promotions?
cricket.answer: Absolutely! Cricket is our most popular sport. We provide IPL, international cricket, and T20 league marketing materials with competitive odds that attract Indian players.

tracking.question: How long is the cookie duration?
tracking.answer: We offer lifetime tracking. Once a player registers through your link, you earn commission from their activity forever - no cookie expiration.

negative.question: Is there negative carryover?
negative.answer: No negative carryover! Each month starts fresh. If your players have a winning month, it doesn't affect your future earnings.

footer.description: Join India's fastest-growing betting affiliate program. Start earning today with Dogplay Agent.

legal.age: 18+ Only. Gambling involves risk. Please play responsibly.
legal.license: Licensed and regulated for fair gaming practices.

blog.title: Latest Insights
blog.description: Stay updated with iGaming and cricket betting news

about.title: About Dogplay Agent
about.description: Your trusted partner in iGaming affiliate marketing
about.missionText: To provide Indian affiliates with the most transparent, profitable, and reliable partnership program in the iGaming industry.
about.editorialText: We are committed to providing accurate, up-to-date information about the iGaming industry. Our content is sourced from verified news outlets and industry publications.
about.teamText: Based in India, our team has over 10 years of combined experience in iGaming and affiliate marketing.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: Get in touch with our team

disclosure.title: Affiliate Disclosure
disclosure.content: Some links on this website are affiliate links. This means if you click on the link and register on Dogplay, we may receive a commission at no additional cost to you. We only promote products and services we believe provide value to our readers. Our recommendations are based on genuine assessments and our experience with the platform.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: This Privacy Policy describes how we collect, use, and protect your information on the Dogplay Agent website.

collection.title: Information We Collect
collection.personal: Personal Information: Name, email address, and contact details you provide when contacting us or registering for our affiliate program.
collection.technical: Technical Information: IP address, browser type, device information, and browsing behavior through cookies and similar technologies.
collection.usage: Usage Information: Pages visited, time spent, and actions taken on our website.

usage.title: How We Use Your Information
items: To respond to your inquiries and provide support
To improve our website and services based on user feedback
To send you updates about our affiliate program (with your consent)
To analyze website traffic and user behavior for optimization purposes

sharing.title: Information Sharing
sharing.content: We do not sell, trade, or rent your personal information to third parties. We may share data with trusted partners who assist us in operating our website, conducting our business, or servicing you, subject to strict confidentiality obligations.

cookies.title: Cookies and Tracking
cookies.content: We use cookies to enhance your browsing experience, analyze site traffic, and for affiliate tracking purposes. You can control cookie settings through your browser preferences.

rights.title: Your Rights
items: Access to your personal data
Correction of inaccurate data
Deletion of your data
Opt-out of marketing communications
Data portability

privacy.contact: For privacy-related inquiries, please contact us at privacy@dogplay.io

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.intro: By accessing or using the Dogplay Agent website, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service.

acceptance.title: Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: Your use of this website constitutes acceptance of these terms. If you do not agree, please do not use this website.

eligibility.title: Eligibility
eligibility.content: You must be at least 18 years old to use this website. By using this site, you represent that you meet this age requirement.

affiliate.title: Affiliate Program Terms
items: Commissions are calculated based on qualified referrals who meet the minimum deposit and activity requirements
Fraudulent traffic or self-referrals will result in immediate account termination
We reserve the right to modify commission structures with 30 days notice
Payment processing times vary by method selected
All marketing materials must be approved before use

prohibited.title: Prohibited Activities
items: Spamming or unsolicited promotional activities
Misleading advertising about potential earnings
Targeting minors or restricted jurisdictions
Using brand trademarks without permission
Any form of click fraud or bot traffic

termination.title: Termination
termination.content: We reserve the right to terminate any affiliate account that violates these terms or engages in fraudulent activity.

limitation.title: Limitation of Liability
limitation.content: We are not liable for any damages arising from your use of this website or participation in the affiliate program.

changes.title: Changes to Terms
changes.content: We may update these terms at any time. Continued use of the website constitutes acceptance of changes.

responsible.title: Responsible Gambling
responsible.intro: Dogplay is committed to promoting responsible gambling practices. We believe gambling should be entertaining and never cause harm.
responsible.warning: WARNING: Gambling involves risk. Only gamble with money you can afford to lose.

items.title: Age Restriction
items.content: Strict 18+ age verification and enforcement. We never target minors in our marketing.

items.title: Self-Exclusion
items.content: Players can request temporary or permanent self-exclusion from the platform.

items.title: Deposit Limits
items.content: Tools to set daily, weekly, or monthly deposit limits to control spending.

items.title: Time Limits
items.content: Session time reminders and limits to help manage playing time.

items.title: Reality Checks
items.content: Pop-up reminders showing time spent and money wagered during sessions.

signs.title: Signs of Problem Gambling
items: Gambling more than you can afford to lose
Chasing losses or borrowing money to gamble
Neglecting work, family, or personal responsibilities
Lying about gambling habits to loved ones
Feeling anxious or irritable when not gambling

resources.title: Help & Support Resources
resources.description: If you or someone you know is struggling with gambling-related issues, help is available:

advice.title: Tips for Responsible Gambling
items: Set a budget and never exceed it
Treat gambling as entertainment, not a way to make money
Never chase losses - accept them as the cost of entertainment
Take regular breaks and set time limits
Don't gamble when under the influence of alcohol or drugs
Balance gambling with other activities
